home.dev: and I'm a Full Stack Developer.
home.desc: I am a web developer that loves taking on logical challenges, building functional and useful pages, and learning new things.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am a Full Stack Developer specialized in Javascript. My passion for programming started in highschool, where I learned the basics with Python. Because of that I signed up for Information Systems Engineering, but after some courses I realized what I liked the most was programming so I started a development bootcamp to start working in what I love.
about.description2: I am interested in any kind of challenge where I can use my knowledge and logical thinking, aswell as continue to develop my skills and learn new technologies.

success.title: Email sent
success.text: The email was sent successfully. Thank you for contacting me, I will be in touch as soon as possible.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.text: An error ocurred and the email could not be sent.
